question: Bring out the only incorrect statement:
option1: Brihadrath was the last ruler of mauryan Dynasty
option2: Devabhuti was the last ruler of Sunga Dynasty
option3: Ajatashatru was the last ruler of Haranyaka Dynasty
option4: Dhana Nanda was the last ruler of Nanda Dynasty
answer: Ajatashatru was the last ruler of Haranyaka Dynasty
explanation: Ajatashatru was a king of the Haryanka dynasty of Magadha in East India. He was the son of King Bimbisara and was a contemporary of both Mahavira and Gautama Buddha. The last ruler of Haryanka dynasty was Nagdashak.
